title: Misappropriation.Detect.Input
description: Profile-aware input for the Misappropriation.Detect capability.

profile.description: Optional reference to the subject profile to load.

profilePatch.description: Optional modifications to apply to the loaded profile.

subject_handles.description: Known social media handles belonging to the subject.

indicators_to_search.description: List of misappropriation indicators to search for (e.g., false likes, false endorsements, impersonation).

platforms.description: Platforms to search (e.g., twitter, instagram, tiktok).

context.description: Optional context from the requesting agent.
